nodes.text: Dromnyr was the native language of the Vultan species from Vulta.
Most Vultans were fluent in both Dromnyr and Basic, being literate in both languages.

Although Vulta was a relatively recent addition to the Galactic Republic (circa 14,000 BBY), Dromnyr language was considered one of the languages that spawned the Galactic Basic Standard, and thus responsible of some important differences between Basic and its parent language, Old Galactic Standard
